demolition

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Entity
      • demolition.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player, RedEnemy, YellowEnemy

    public abstract class Character
extends Entity
    This abstract class is used for functions relevant to all entities that can move in four directions, described as Characters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Direction dir
      The current direction of the character.
      protected java.util.Map<Direction,java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage>> frames
      A map of each animation cycle, pertaining to each direction in which the character could be facing.

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.Entity

        animationState, currentFrame, gameTime, x, y

      • Character

        public Character(java.util.Map<Direction,java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage>> frames,
                 int startX,
                 int startY)
        Constructs a new Character object, as called by inherited classes. This constructor is used when the entity has a starting position at initialisation.
        Parameters:
        frames - The animation frames used by the entity.
        startX - The initial x-coordinate of the character.
        startY - The initial y-coordinate of the character.

        Returns:

        public boolean move(Direction dir,
